name: Twin Stick Madness
description:
Try to survive for as long as you can and get a high score! Enemies will start to spawn in faster and faster the longer that you're alive! This game was made in 3 hours for the Friday Night Game Jam 2020-37. If you want to replay it, you'll have to refresh the page since I didn't get enough time to implement it into the game itself.

FEATURES

Two Unique Enemies

"Endless" Game

Score System

Enemy Spawns Speeding Up

GENRE

Shoot em up (SHMUP) / Twin Stick Shooter

CONTROLS

WASD to MOVE

ARROW KEYS to SHOOT
